title: Tailoring the Wadsley-Roth Crystallographic Shear Structures for High-Power Lithium-ion Batteries

Exploring a universal strategy to increase Li-ion storage capacity and ionic conductivity while maintaining a robust crystal framework is a significant challenge for advancing Wadsley-Roth shear phases as promising anodes...
